item.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation Credits - All Seasons Synced
item.description: A while back I was watching a lot of episodes of Star Trek: The Next Generation. As the cast changes over the show's seven seasons, the opening credits also change and I wondered if I could sync the credits together to visualize how the changes worked. Finding a point to sync the videos was difficult. After trying a few different places I ended up using the moment the Enterprise first appears.
